servinfo.title: Exhaust Pipe and Muffler Removal and Installation
servinfo.ptxt:
To remove and install exhaust pipes and muffler, refer to
and the following.

item.ptxt: For N32A, remove engine rear mounting to remove and install exhaust pipe No.1.
When engine rear mounting is installed, tighten bolts to specified torque referring to Engine Mountings Components:N32A .
Tighten bolts and nuts to specified torques when reassembling exhaust pipes and muffler.
Run engine and check for exhaust leaks.
